FKE Seminar Series – Dr. Fatin Hamimi Binti Hamat @ Mustafa
===========================================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | May 7, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Dr-Fatin-FKE-seminar-series-1080x675.jpg)

Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

Students and staff are cordially invited to attend a seminar organized by the FKE Seminar Committee, which is scheduled as follows:

Speaker: Dr Fatin Hamimi Binti Hamat @ Mustafa  
Affiliation: Biomedical Instrumentation and Electronics Research Group, Faculty of Electrical Engineering, UTM  
Title: Detection of Communicable and Non-Communicable Diseases Using Optical Spectroscopy  
Date: 21 May 2024 (Tuesday)  
Time: 2.30 PM – 3.30 PM  
Venue: Active Learning Classroom, Level 5, P19a  
Moderator: Dr Siti Balqis Binti Samdin

We are looking forward to your participation. Thank you.

(CPD hour is awarded for staff, postgraduate students attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement)
